author: rbb
msg: Get mod_cgid to use apr calls for creating the actual CGI process.
This also allows mod_cgid to use ap_os_create_priviledged_process,
thus allowing for SuExec execution from mod_cgid.  Currently, we do
not support everything that standard SuExec supports, but at least

author: jimw
msg: intro page and documentation for libapreq

author: rbb
msg: Allow SuExec to be configured from the ./configure command line
